Title: Exploration of Pretrained Models used in Automatic Speech Recognition System: A Review and Analysis
Abstract: automatic speech recognition  asr  systems have made significant strides in recent years we have advent of deep learning and the availability of large scale pretraining methods. this research paper presents a comprehensive review and analysis of leveraging pretrained models for asr systems. it explores the benefits of using pretrained models examines various architectures and techniques discusses challenges and limitations and suggests future directions for research and development in this field.
